revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Libre Computer |model=Tritium |revision=H3 (1GB)
(ALL-H3-CC) |asin=B07D4KT1GQ |price=19 |est_release_date=01/2018 |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=H3 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63CFR-RDC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=ESD Protection Array for I/O Port;Amazing Micro;AZ1045-04F;;2;,,, Ultra low dropout, 500mA, CMOS LDO;Will Semi;WL2803E;;1;,,, PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP8036;;1; |flags=HDMI 1.4, Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module connector, CVBS header, IR receiver, microphone, GPIO, SPI, I2C, MIPI CPI |stock_boot=U-Boot;2018.05; |stock_os=Linux;4.19.31;Ubuntu 18.04; |tp_firmware=Android 7.0, Armbian, Debian, Raspbian, RetroPie, LibreELEC }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ Product page] {{See also|Allwinner|Amlogic|List of Single-board computers}} "Libre Computer Board" and "ALL-H3-CC-V1.0-A"'' is silkscreened :on the board near the 40-pin GPIO connector. ===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Libre_Computer_Project#ALL-H3-CC_(Tritium) ''Libre Computer ALL-H3-CC (Tritium)'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Libre_Computer_Board_ALL-H3-CC ''Libre Computer ALL-H3-CC Series Boards'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/11/15/9-libre-computer-tritium-allwinner-h2h3h5-sbcs-leverage-raspberry-pi-3-form-factor-crowdfunding/ ''Libre Computer Tritium Allwinner H2+/H3/H5 SBCs'' on '''CNX|Software'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H3 @1.0GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex-A7) *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM (''SK hynix'') *Onboard Storage: eMMC 4.1 module, :TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 4x USB 2.0 ports ===Models=== *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1/2GB • [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1/2/4GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Tritium H5]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 2GB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium H3]] (ALL-H3-CC H3) • 1GB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium IoT]] (ALL-H3-CC H2+) • 512MB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] ====ALL-H3-CC (Tritium)==== {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" style="text-align:center;" ! Variant !! [[Libre Computer Tritium IoT|Tritium IoT]] (512MB)
ALL-H3-CC H2+ !! [[Libre Computer Tritium H3|Tritium H3]] (1GB)
ALL-H3-CC H3 !! [[Libre Computer Tritium H5|Tritium H5]] (2GB)
ALL-H3-CC H5 |- ! CPU | [[Allwinner]] H2+
4x ARM (Cortex-A7) || [[Allwinner]] H3
4x ARM (Cortex-A7) || [[Allwinner]] H5
4x ARM (Cortex-A53) |- ! GPU | 1G + 2P ARM Mali-400
OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1 | 1G + 2P ARM Mali-400
OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1 | 2G + 4P ARM Mali-450
OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1 |- ! VPU | colspan=3 | [[Allwinner]] Display Engine 2.0 • Encoders: H.264 (1080p30)
• Decoders: VP8 (1080p60), H.265/H.264 (4k30/1080p60), JPEG/MJPEG (1080p30) |- ! Storage | colspan=3 | MicroSD Card Slot, eMMC 4.x Interface |- ! colspan=1 | RAM | 512MB (DDR3-1600) || 1GB (DDR3-1600) || 2GB (DDR3-1600) |- ! USB | colspan=3 | 4x USB 2.0 Type A |- ! colspan=1 | Network | colspan=3 | 100Mbps (Fast Ethernet) |- ! colspan=1 | Video Out | colspan=2 | HDMI 1.4 (1080p) HDCP 1.2,
3.5mm TRRS AV Jack | colspan=1 | HDMI 1.4 (4k30) HDCP 1.2,
3.5mm TRRS AV Jack |- ! colspan=1 | Other | colspan=3 | IR Receiver, U-Boot Button, UART header, 40-pin header (PWM, I2C, SPI, GPIO) |- |} *[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12IEGROXwIxAJqNpW3v9YGZjgCURPU9AwKNgX6TMyhi4/htmlview ALL-H3-CC vs Raspberry Pi 3] __NOTOC__
